articles.description: Concert for Ukraine aired on ITV on Tuesday night, with stars including Ed Sheeran and Nile Rogers & Chic on stage
articles.content:
Millions of viewers tuned into ITV on Tuesday night to watch the Concert for Ukraine and many of them were left searching for the same answer in the final moments.
 It has now been over a month sinc… [+1800 chars]

articles.author: Charlotte Rodrigues
articles.title: Holby City fans enraged to learn what's replacing it - Entertainment Daily
articles.description: Holby City fans have been left furious after finding out that Masterchef will be taking the BBC medical drama's timeslot next Tuesday.
articles.content:
Holby City fans have been left furious after finding out what will be taking the BBC medical drama’s time slot next Tuesday (April 5).
Last night, Holby City came to an end after 23 years on the end… [+3967 chars]
